site_name: THE WILDLIFE CENTER AT UNCLE DONALDS FARM INC

citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
No written program of veterinary care was available for review. A written program veterinary care is required to
demonstrate adequate veterinary care and Attending Veterinarian oversight of health care and husbandry is being
provided to the animals. A written program of veterinary care covering all animals must be completed by May 11, 2023.

There is an excessive accumulation of hair and waste on the wire surfaces of the angora rabbit enclosure. Hair and
debris accumulating on enclosures can expose the animals to potential disease hazards. Enclosures must be kept
reasonably free of hair and debris by cleaning surfaces on a regular basis. Correct by April 29, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
No written program of veterinary care was available for review. A written program veterinary care is required to 
demonstrate adequate veterinary care and Attending Veterinarian oversight of health care and husbandry is being 
provided to the animals. A written program of veterinary care covering all animals must be completed by May 11, 2023. 
3.56(a)(1) 
   
Sanitation. 
There is an excessive accumulation of hair and waste on the wire surfaces of the angora rabbit enclosure.  Hair and 
debris accumulating on enclosures can expose the animals to potential disease hazards. Enclosures must be kept 
reasonably free of hair and debris by cleaning surfaces on a regular basis. Correct by April 29, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
